results.title: Effects of a new SGLT2 inhibitor, luseogliflozin, on diabetic nephropathy in T2DN rats.
results.text_hl: Reducing blood pressure with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ prevented the fall in GFR and reduced @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ and the degree of @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@glomerular injury@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Tubular_Necrosis_Acute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007683 @@@tubular necrosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Kojima N, Williams JM, Takahashi T, Miyata N, Roman RJ. Effects of a new SGLT2 inhibitor, luseogliflozin, on diabetic nephropathy in T2DN rats. J Pharmacol Exp Ther. 2013 Jun;345(3):464-72. PMID: 23492941
citations.BibTeX: @article{23492941, title={Effects of a new SGLT2 inhibitor, luseogliflozin, on diabetic nephropathy in T2DN rats.}, author={Kojima N and Williams JM and Takahashi T and Miyata N and Roman RJ}, journal={J Pharmacol Exp Ther}, volume={345}, number={3}, pages={464-72}}

results.title: Effect of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors on ischaemia-reperfusion-induced renal injury in rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ treatment decreased @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Tubular_Necrosis_Acute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007683 @@@tubular necrosis@@@ and urinary casts but no marked effect on @DISEASE_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@haemorrhagic streaks@@@ was noted.

citations.NLM: Krishan P, Sharma A, Singh M. Effect of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors on ischaemia-reperfusion-induced renal injury in rats. Pharmacol Res. 1998 Jan;37(1):23-9. PMID: 9503476
citations.BibTeX: @article{9503476, title={Effect of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors on ischaemia-reperfusion-induced renal injury in rats.}, author={Krishan P and Sharma A and Singh M}, journal={Pharmacol Res}, volume={37}, number={1}, pages={23-9}}
